attributes.action: Make Politicians Personally responcible for any misuse of Taxpayers Money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that Politicians are immune from prosecution , this should be changed, any politician found guilty of misusing taxpayers money, he or she should be personally liable for any loss and liable to criminal prosecution

rejection.details: Politicians are not immune from criminal prosecution.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
